processors.name: rastermap
processors.description: Compute the sorting order of units using Rastermap
processors.label: rastermap

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: Input NWB file in .nwb or .nwb.lindi.tar format

parameters.name: units_path
parameters.description: Path to the units table in the NWB file

parameters.name: n_clusters
parameters.description: Number of clusters to use in Rastermap. 0 means None.

parameters.name: n_PCs
parameters.description: Number of principal components to use in Rastermap

parameters.name: locality
parameters.description: Locality in sorting to find sequences (this is a value from 0 to 1)
